placeholderImages.description: Close-up of a person holding a warm cup of coffee, with a blurred, serene background, a single drop creating a ripple in the coffee, symbolizing focus and effect.
A clean, modern flat lay of a coffee cup, a notebook, and a pair of glasses on a minimalist desk, representing a scientific and organized approach to understanding caffeine.
An antique compass resting on a vintage map, representing guidance, precision, and the mission to navigate the complexities of caffeine consumption.
Professional headshot of a thoughtful, mature female scientist with glasses, looking directly at the camera with a soft smile in a well-lit laboratory setting.
A professional and friendly headshot of a young male software developer with glasses, smiling in a modern, bright office environment.
A simple, elegant logo for Caffeine Compass, featuring a stylized compass with a coffee bean at its center.
